ygData.subject: Executioner's Axe Info
ygData.msgSnippet: OK your tip on Emperor Crush is all wrong first off think how easy it would be to get an extremely easy weapon, as it is the Spawn for the first Holy Paladin
ygData.messageBody:
OK your tip on Emperor Crush is all wrong first off think how easy it would
be to get an extremely easy weapon, as it is the Spawn for the first Holy
Paladin weapon Ghouls Bane only spawns once a week.

I've heard two diffrent sources for the executioner's axe, one it's found in
the Tower in Oasis which is reasonable enough considering it's guarded by
spectres. I've also heard that it's found off the executioner in Qeynos who
is supposably level 45. Hope that helps.

Koradin the Barbarian Warrior
-----Original Message-----

>Message: 2
> Date: Wed, 19 May 1999 11:03:49 -0400
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>Subject: Re: me and me and totaly ooc (rant,ooc and pathetic lives)
>
>Hey vash , seems we have the same problem,
>
>Heres my daily routine starting from 5pm.
>
>5pm, leave work in a hurry leaving office a mess,
>505 jump onto bus couting the seconds as it takes forver to gethome,
>530 leap off bus and bound home keeping my eyes open for any would be
>creatures on my street.
>535 grab a pepsi and log onto solusek ro as lothaniel.
>700 think about supper
>701 forget about supper
>12am think about sleep
>1201 forget about sleep
>200 passout on keyboard
>201 wake up to the sound of a mob kickin my but
>230 decide to sleep
>500 wake up early to play EQ when there is minmal people
>800 realize i havent even gotten dressed or showered for work
>826 realize i missed the 825 bus to work
>900 - 500 pm sit at desk in office, read all sorts or news letters and
posts
>while pretnding to be a good worker.
>
>REPEAT.
>
>Lothaniel the OH SO VERY TIRED BUT WANT TO PLAY T'kazz
>Level 31 warrior
>Solusek Ro
>John Zwanenburg
>Tips Support/Support Sipt
>Tel: (613) 998-2745
>

>> partymember laughs at a humans butt in chainmail
>> gf hangs up askin me to call when the computer is turned off.

>> Tries to light a smoke buy realize that I should have bought more.

>> run down to work, buy a sandwich on the way.

>>
>> AAAHHHRRRRGGGGG I thought i was safe from the computer gaming addiction

it

>> was then, if not worse.
>>

>Message: 6
> Date: Wed, 19 May 1999 11:23:23 -0400
> From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
>Subject: Re: me and me and totaly ooc (rant,ooc and pathetic lives)
>
>ROFL!!! This is me in a nutshell ... except you forgot a couple of parts...
>
>- Compiles a full blown notebook of EQ info printed from the web with a
huge
>stck of paper on the company high speed laser printer. Take home and think
about
>doing another one to reference at work ...
>- Talk 3 people at work into playing EQ. They become just as addicted as
me. We
>all milk each other though the bleary eyed first hour of work, dinking
caffeine
>to help restore a seriousack of sleep.
>- Talk several customers (mostly techies) into playing EQ while I'm
installing
>their new equipment at their site.
>- Seriously consider a second account for "those times when I just don't
want to
>be myself ... but have help from myself"
>- Actually start dreaming of those female PC's from EQ. (Hey ... is it just
me
>or do some of them look damn good?)
>- Put off every errand I've had to do for the last month until after
Christmas
>sometime .... if I'm not busy.
>- Started going home for lunch so I can make a quick plat or two.
>
>If you are pathetic then I am too....
>
>-Faderic
>

>> but the whereabouts of Gnasher.
>>
>> Gnasher Furrgut (I think thats his last name) is a named gnoll
>> that hangs out in Qeynos Hills. It is part of a quest that when
>> completed, you get to watch the Executioner (a barbarian woman
>> in full platemail with the horned helmet) open a can of whoop-ass
>> on a tavern barkeep in Qeynos. I actually hit the barkeep a couple
>> of times while she was fighting him to see if I would get a faction
>> hit when he died but since she killed him, no faction hit.
>>

>Message: 13
> Date: Wed, 19 May 1999 10:47:51 -0500
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>Subject: Re: Playing a Troll Warrior
>
>People often think that the troll regen rate makes the the ultimate
warrior. That may be true at first, but at later levels you get to the
point where you have to have a healer of some type in your group, or you
will die. And at that point the troll regen is almost pointless. If you
want brute str Ogre is the way to go. Their str, sta, dex, and agil are
much better than Trolls, not to mention ogres have the most points to
distribute. You can easily get your dex and agil above 90 and still have
your str and sta WELL above 100. Ogres are also smarter and wiser than
Trolls, so they also make better SKs and shamans....with one
exception....trolls regen rate works very nicely with the canabalize spell.
>
>Just my 2 cents :)
>
>Salr D'Taynkk
>Dark Warrior of The Kith
>Veeshan
>
><<< "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...> 5/19 9:22a >>>
>From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
>Eyebeebad,
>
>Seeing as how you are a troll (good choice) your hp are gonna go up faster
>than all other races which is a bonus cause you want haveto wait around so
>long, my advise to you is to kill rats, decaying skels, syoung water
>mocasins untill level 4 or so. Then if you can find one other level 4 or 5
>char, go for normal froglocks or a weak froglock fisherman....oonce you hit
>5 you can probably solo them as well as the occasion swamp alligator, once
>on level 6 head to guk but dont go in too deep, stik the the larger
froglock
>tads and sentinels....good exp for you and the occasional woven/netted
>armor, (which sells great to any monks or spell casters. Oh you can get
>netted off the small froglock tads as well.) then once you hit 10 id
suggest
>making your way to the south desert of ro, find a group and kill dercishes
>and orcs, at around 13-15 go for the oasis and kill crocs, caimans, and the
>occasional Deepwater caiman....just watch out for the giants,
>...........after that the rest is up to you.
>
>lemme know if you need any more advise...i have a troll SK so i know the
>area very very well.
>John Zwanenburg
>Tips Support/Support Sipt
>Tel: (613) 998-2745
>

>Message: 20
> Date: Wed, 19 May 1999 13:27:18 -0400
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>Subject: Re: Need Directions
>
>To get to guk from around freeport is easy, take the tunnl to North Ro then
>walk toards the huts by the ocean....simply follow the coast right up
untill
>you hit the oasis. Once there keep following the coast past the dock, right
>up untill you see an inn to your right. walk in a straight line past that
>inn....as in start at it facing the door and go behind it. watch out cause
>there are tons of ginats raoming around the oasis. Once you zone into
>southeren Ro hang a left and follow the wall all the way to the next
>zone...innothule swamp. To get to guk follow the left hand wall and youll
>eventually run into a small cave, thats guk. Depending on your level you
>will wanna stay in Upper Guk, there are tons of forgs to kill of all
>different level as well as a section full of Heart spiders, (thats my
>suggestion ... they give great loot and the giant heart spider drops the
>chitin shell sheild AC 15 10 to resit poison and weighs 4 pounds.) just be
>carefull cause trains are a constant plague in this dungeon
>
>John Zwanenburg
>Tips Support/Support Sipt
>Tel: (613) 998-2745
>

>Message: 24
> Date: Wed, 19 May 1999 13:46:55 -0400
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>Subject: Re: Anyone have any hints on starting a guild
>
>To start a guild is a long process...
>
>1. get 9 people recruited into your guild
>2. get all 9 to send an email with the guild name as the subject, and their
>login names, char names in the body
>3. send an email to verant yourself wil the same info as well as the guild
>Charter.
>4 wait for 2-4 weeks for verant to get back to you.
>5 if they accept your guild then you will have to contact a Gm at a certain
>time. then they will give you as the leader the ability to add people into
>your guild.
>
>thats the basics.
>John Zwanenburg
>Tips Support/Support Sipt
>Tel: (613) 998-2745
>
